mods.abstract: The scene depicts a large dark hand which overpowers the dwarfed man of humanity. The hand is grotesquely exaggerated to suggest a rake. This is understood to be the hand of Satan who rakes humanity into his grasp as if it were dried leaves.
mods.note: This lithograph was printed by the artist while at LSU in Baton Rouge. The print, done using stone, was drawn with a lithographic pencil, lithographic ink and some scraping.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art
